name: teleRHYTHM
description:
teleRHYTHM is an arcade rhythm-based bullethell game.  Teleport on every beat to spawn bullets, then teleport again to avoid them.

Features:

  • cool little guy!
  • skulls!
  • randomly generated trees!
  • 42 different death messages! (don't worry, you'll see them all)
  • visual clutter!
  • wayyyy too many particle effects and post-processing layers!
  • the same music track played enough times for it to appear in your nightmares!

Thanks for checking this out! This is the first game I've made, so any feedback is greatly appreciated ♥
